post.title: RIDGE Forum 2025
post.excerpt: The RIDGE Forum took place in May 2025 in Lima, Peru, organized by the Red de Investigaci贸n en Desarrollo Econ贸mico (RIDGE). The event brought together researchers and international authorities to discuss progress and challenges in key topics of development economics, such as inequality, public policies, international finance, and sustainable economic growth.
